channel.title: Need Coders for Development of MimeScape
channel.description:
[b]Need Coders for Development of MimeScape[/b]
I have Currently been coding a little bit of MimeScape, and i have relized if i want to make this a really good server i will need some help.
[b]Some thing i would like to achive:[/b] Full Agility Full Fletching Full Cooking Full RuneCrafting Perfect Combat Skills Perfect Specials Lunar Magic Fighter Torso Minigame Added Smithing Added Mining Added Some Agility
If you would like to join please post this Application
[code]What would you like to do:[b][/b] How long have you been coding:[b][/b] What do you Specialize in:[b][/b] Tutorials you've done:(post a link)[b][/b][/code]
[b]Server Coders:[/b] R1ch kid Open Open Open
[b]Client/WebClient Coders:[/b] Open Open Open Open
[b]Site Coders:[/b] Open Open Open Open
[b]Testers:[/b] Open Open Open Open

item.title: Need Coders for Development of MimeScape
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

you guys maybe dont want me but i can do task you find unimportant or anoying like cfgs and other things giving you more time to work on more important things like the JAVA?
so want me or i can be a tester im no noob i know some great stuff and i can help with other things to. so want me {yes\no}

Read full topic
